Class: Matrix4x4

goo\math/Matrix4x4

extends Matrix

Matrix with 4x4 components.

new Matrix4x4(Matrix4x4|Float[]|...Float arguments)

Member summary

Float32Array data

Column-major storage for the matrix components.

Method summary

Matrix4x4 add (Matrix4x4|Float rhs)

Performs a component-wise addition.
Vector4 applyPost (Vector4 rhs)

Applies the matrix (rotation, scale, translation, projection) to a four-dimensional vector. (x = M*x)
Vector3 applyPostPoint (Vector3 rhs)

Applies the matrix (rotation, scale, translation) to a three-dimensional vector.
Vector3 applyPostVector (Vector3 rhs)

Applies the matrix (rotation, scale) to a three-dimensional vector.
Vector4 applyPre (Vector4 rhs)

Applies the matrix (rotation, scale, translation, projection) to a four-dimensional vector. (x = (x*M)^T)
Matrix4x4 combine (Matrix4x4 rhs)

Combines two matrices (matrix multiplication) and stores the result locally.
Matrix4x4 copy (Matrix4x4 source)

Copies component values and stores them locally.
Float determinant ()

Computes the determinant of the matrix.
Matrix4x4 div (Matrix4x4|Float rhs)

Performs a component-wise division.
boolean equals (Matrix rhs)

Compares two matrices for approximate equality.
Matrix4x4 getScale (Vector3 store)

Gets the scaling part of the matrix.
Matrix4x4 getTranslation (Vector3 store)

Gets the translational part of the matrix.
Matrix4x4 invert ()

Computes the analytical inverse and stores the result locally.
Boolean isNormal ()

Tests if the matrix is normal.
Boolean isOrthogonal ()

Tests if the matrix is orthogonal.
Boolean isOrthonormal ()

Tests if the matrix is orthonormal.
Matrix4x4 mul (Matrix4x4|Float rhs)

Performs a component-wise multiplication.
Matrix set (Matrix|number[]|number arguments)

Sets the components of the matrix.
Matrix4x4 setIdentity ()

Sets the matrix to identity.
Matrix4x4 setRotationFromQuaternion (Vector4 quaternion)

Sets the rotational part of the matrix from a quaternion.
Matrix4x4 setRotationFromVector (Vector3 angles)

Sets the rotational part of the matrix from a vector of angles. Order convention is x followed by y followed by z.
Matrix4x4 setScale (Vector3 scale)

Sets the scale of the matrix.
Matrix4x4 setTranslation (Vector3 translation)

Sets the translational part of the matrix.
Matrix4x4 sub (Matrix4x4|Float rhs)

Performs a component-wise subtraction.
String toString ()

Converts the matrix into a string.
Matrix4x4 transpose ()

Transposes the matrix (exchanges rows and columns) and stores the result locally.
<static> Matrix4x4 add (Matrix4x4 lhs, Matrix4x4|Float rhs, Matrix4x4 target)

Performs a component-wise addition.
<static> Matrix4x4 combine (Matrix4x4 lhs, Matrix4x4 rhs, Matrix4x4 target)

Combines two matrices (matrix multiplication) and stores the result in a separate matrix.
<static> Matrix4x4 div (Matrix4x4 lhs, Matrix4x4|Float rhs, Matrix4x4 target)

Performs a component-wise division.
<static> Matrix4x4 invert (Matrix4x4 source, Matrix4x4 target)

Computes the analytical inverse and stores the result in a separate matrix.
<static> Matrix4x4 mul (Matrix4x4 lhs, Matrix4x4|Float rhs, Matrix4x4 target)

Performs a component-wise multiplication.
<static> Matrix4x4 sub (Matrix4x4 lhs, Matrix4x4|Float rhs, Matrix4x4 target)

Performs a component-wise subtraction.
<static> Matrix4x4 transpose (Matrix4x4 source, Matrix4x4 target)

Transposes a matrix (exchanges rows and columns) and stores the result in a separate matrix.
